message:
Um, so how do I actually go about installing these extensions. I tried one of them, it didn't have a readme file worth a damn, so I am lost.

Note that I am no noob, and can navigate cloning the repos, I just don't see any instructions for installation.
author: Callista Graves

posts.message: If you go to Ulauncher Pref page, you should see the Extensions tab where you just hit the Add extension button and follow the instruction
posts.author: Kay

posts.message:
I think you are making a good point. There is no information on how to install extensions if you found this website before discovered Extensions tab in Ulauncher preferences.
I'm going to make some updates on the website to fix this issue.

Thanks for bringing this up, btw.

Aleksandr
posts.author: Aleksandr Gornostal

message:
Command '['locate','-l','8',u'-r']' return non-zero exit status 1
Manjaro XFCE 17.1.6, I can't find the solution!!! help!!!
author: Daniel Fern√°ndez

posts.message:
This comes to you because you not provide any patten to search for.

'Command '['locate','-l','8',u'-r']' return non-zero exit status 1' means runs 'locate -l 8 -r' on terminal returns non-zeros (failed).

Can you give a specific example. I have a file located:

$ which pycharm.sh
/opt/pycharm-2018.2/bin/pycharm.sh
I have tried every option and just get the same error. How would I go about searching and launching this script from uLauncher?
posts.author: Bryan

message: is it possible to make launcher find in folders / files without a keyWord? Thanks!
author: Yuri
